action.description: The committee on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Matayoshi, Chun, Ilagan, Ichiyama, Marten, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Tam;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Kong, Lowen.
